name: arkui-js
description: JavaScript modules for ArkUI Blazor component library

scripts.build: esbuild Scripts/accordion.js Scripts/popover.js Scripts/focus-trap.js Scripts/select.js Scripts/tabs.js Scripts/dropdown-menu.js --bundle --format=esm --outdir=wwwroot --minify
scripts.watch: esbuild Scripts/accordion.js Scripts/popover.js Scripts/focus-trap.js Scripts/select.js Scripts/tabs.js Scripts/dropdown-menu.js --bundle --format=esm --outdir=wwwroot --watch
